de.cect.blockid.identitystorage.identitystorage.datamanager.logic.api.usecase

Interface UcGetSpecificIdentityAssertion

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Datamanager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatamanagerImpl, UcGetSpecificIdentityAssertionImpl

    public interface UcGetSpecificIdentityAssertion
    Usecase receiving a specific identity assertion specified by receiver address, sender address and identity assertion name.
    Since:
    blockid-0.0.1
    Author:
    ctinnes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IdAssertionMessageTo getSpecificIdentityAssertion(java.lang.String receiverAddressBase64, java.lang.String senderAddressBase64, java.lang.String identityAttributeName)
      Fetches a specific identity assertions from the database for a given receiver, sender and attribute name.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecificIdentityAssertion

        IdAssertionMessageTo getSpecificIdentityAssertion(java.lang.String receiverAddressBase64,
                                                  java.lang.String senderAddressBase64,
                                                  java.lang.String identityAttributeName)
        Fetches a specific identity assertions from the database for a given receiver, sender and attribute name. This should be uniquely identified by the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        the - given receiver address in base64 encoding.
        the - given sender address in base64 encoding.
        the - identity attribute name.
        Returns:
        the persisted identity assertion messages.
